# MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.full

**Case**

Spells out units in full.

## Declaration

```swift
case full
```

## Discussion

For example, your map displays “kilometer” instead of the abbreviation “km.”

## Constants

- **MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.default**: Bases the determination to abbreviate on the current locale and user language settings.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.abbreviated**: Abbreviates units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.default**: Bases the determination to abbreviate on the current locale and user language settings.
